  • Method Details

    • before

      public static void before​(io.cucumber.java.Scenario scenario)

    • verifyImageComparison

      @Then("^I verify (?:the|an?) (page|window|.*?) (do(?:es)? not )?match(?:es)? the (expected|original|previous|.*?) image$") public static void verifyImageComparison​(java.lang.String elementName, java.lang.String assertion, java.lang.String storedImageCheck)
      Takes a screenshot of the given element or page/window and compares it to the previously-stored or taken image of that same element or page/window.

      Default scaling pixel tolerance level = 0.06%. This translates to ~1244 pixels. Roughly a 35x35 image area at 1080p resolution.
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element to capture and compare.
      assertion - String the user input determining if we expect a match or a mismatch.
      storedImageCheck - String the user input indicating if we use a previously taken snapshot, or one whose path is stored in testData

    • checkIfImagesMatch

      private static boolean checkIfImagesMatch​(java.lang.String elementName, boolean negate, java.lang.String optionalStoredImage)
      Takes an updated screenshot of the current element or page/window for comparison to an earlier or stored image.

      If screenshots are different sizes, both will be enlarged to the largest dimensions found. Expanded space will be set to the first found background color for web, red for other page object types
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element to capture and compare or any casing of "page" alone to compare the entire page.
      negate - String indicating if a match is or is not expected
      optionalStoredImage - String the user input indicating stored or previously taken screenshot for comparison
      Returns:
      Boolean if the images matched

    • processScreenshot

      private static java.io.File processScreenshot​(PageObjectType pageType, java.lang.String elementName)
      Takes a screenshot of the given page/window/element, using the page type to dictate how it shall process the output, and returns the generated file.
      Parameters:
      pageType - the type of page to screenshot
      elementName - the name of the element, or page/window
      Returns:
      File the generated temporary screenshot file

    • processBackgroundColor

      private static java.awt.Color processBackgroundColor​(PageObjectType pageType, java.lang.String elementName)
      Uses the element/page/window name and page object type to return the appropriate background color for image expansion
      Parameters:
      pageType - the type of page to screenshot
      elementName - the name of the element, or window/page
      Returns:
      Color the processed background color

    • equalizeImages

      private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.awt.image.BufferedImage> equalizeImages​(java.awt.Color backgroundColor, java.awt.image.BufferedImage comparisonImage, java.awt.image.BufferedImage currentImage)
      Takes a background color and two images, and returns a map of processed images. The processed images will be resized to the largest dimensions with the type of page and element name used to process the background color for expansion. If the images are the same size, the map will return the unprocessed BufferedImages.
      Parameters:
      backgroundColor - the background color to use for newly generated empty space on image expansion
      comparisonImage - the previously stored image to compare
      currentImage - the current image to compare
      Returns:
      Map of key string comparison or current with the processed BufferedImage stored as the value
